title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
Unleash the Power of Sound Anywhere with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker!

Elevate your listening experience with the exceptional Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, your ultimate companion for travel, outdoor adventures, and poolside relaxation. Designed with a sleek black finish, this portable speaker is more than just a device; it's an experience that transforms the way you enjoy music.

üéµ **Immersive Audio Quality**: Dive into a sea of deep bass and crystal-clear sound, thanks to Bose's exclusive audio technologies. With a custom-engineered transducer and innovative PositionIQ technology, the SoundLink Flex ensures that your music is rich and immersive, no matter where you are.

üí¶ **Rugged Waterproof Design**: Fear no splashes or spills! The SoundLink Flex boasts an IP67 waterproof rating and even floats on water. Whether you're caught in the rain or lounging by the pool, this speaker is engineered to endure.

üöÄ **Unmatched Durability**: Ready for any challenge, the SoundLink Flex is not only water-resistant but also dust, drop, corrosion, and UV light resistant. It's rigorously drop-tested to guarantee that it can keep up with your active lifestyle.

üîã **Long-Lasting Battery Life**: Keep the party going with up to 12 hours of playtime per charge. When it's time to power up, the convenient USB-C cable ensures a quick recharge, so you're always ready for the next adventure.

üîä **Smart Connectivity**: Stay connected with a wireless range of up to 30 feet, and enjoy the convenience of a built-in microphone for calls. Access Siri or Google Assistant with ease, and personalize your experience with the Bose Connect App.

üéí **Ultimate Portability**: Compact and easy to carry, the SoundLink Flex features a utility loop for secure attachment to your gear. Its compact design means it fits effortlessly into your day, whether you're heading to the beach or exploring the great outdoors.

‚ú® **Bose Connect App Support**: Keep your speaker up-to-date with software updates, and customize settings to tailor your listening experience.

The Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is not just a speaker‚Äîit's a statement. It's for the movers, the shakers, the outdoor enthusiasts, and the pool party hosts. It's for those who demand the best in audio quality and durability. Don't settle for less‚Äîchoose the speaker that flexes to fit your life.

üõí Grab yours today and transform the way you hear the world! üåê

Unleash the power of sound anywhere you go with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker! Crafted for those who crave impeccable audio quality on the move, this sleek black portable speaker is your ultimate travel, outdoor, and poolside companion.

Discover the deep, rich bass and crystal-clear audio that Bose is renowned for. Thanks to the custom-engineered transducer and innovative PositionIQ technology, your music automatically adjusts to ensure an immersive listening experience no matter how you position the speaker.

Adventure-ready and built to endure, the SoundLink Flex boasts an IP67 waterproof rating, meaning it's fully equipped to handle submersion in water. Plus, it floats! Whether you're caught in a downpour or lounging by the pool, the music plays on. And with dust, shock, corrosion, and UV light resistance, this speaker is tough enough for all your escapades.

Stay untethered and connected with a robust wireless range of up to 30 feet. The built-in microphone allows for crystal-clear calls and access to Siri and Google Assistant, making hands-free interaction a breeze. The compact design coupled with a handy utility loop ensures that your music can hang out in style, wherever you are.

Keep the party going all day or all night with up to 12 hours of battery life per charge. When it's time to refuel, the included USB-C cable gets you back to full power in just about 4 hours.

Take control of your audio experience with the Bose Connect App, offering software updates and customizable settings to fine-tune your listening. Whether you're on a rugged trail or drifting on a float, the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker delivers the sound you love with the durability you need. Get yours today and transform the way you hear the world around you!

Unleash the power of portable sound with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker ‚Äì the ultimate travel companion for music lovers on the move. Designed with the modern adventurer in mind, this sleek black speaker is the epitome of durability and versatility, ready to elevate your audio experience wherever you go.

Whether you're lounging by the pool, embarking on an outdoor escapade, or jet-setting across the globe, the SoundLink Flex has got you covered. Boasting a rugged, waterproof body with an IP67 rating, it can survive complete immersion in water, battle dust, and withstand drops without missing a beat. And yes, this little marvel floats on water, ensuring your tunes stay afloat with you!

Dive into the deep, rich bass and crystal-clear sound that only Bose can deliver. Thanks to exclusive audio technologies like the custom-engineered transducer and innovative PositionIQ technology, the SoundLink Flex adapts to its orientation to provide an immersive sound experience that's second to none.

Stay connected hands-free with the built-in microphone, enabling easy access to Siri and Google Assistant. Make calls, send voice commands, or simply bask in your favorite beats for up to 12 hours on a single charge. The intuitive Bose Connect App keeps your speaker up-to-date with the latest software, allowing you to customize settings for a personalized listening journey.

Light as a feather and tough as nails, this portable speaker is designed with a compact form factor, featuring a convenient utility loop for secure attachment to your gear. Its wireless connectivity ensures you can stream music effortlessly within a 30-foot range, making it the perfect audio pal for any setting.

The Bose SoundLink Flex is not just a speaker; it's a statement. It's a commitment to premium sound quality, rugged durability, and on-the-go convenience. So, pack your bags, grab your SoundLink Flex, and immerse yourself in the soundtrack of your life, no matter where the road takes you.

**Unleash Incredible Sound Anywhere with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker**

Experience sound that moves with you. Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker ‚Äì your ultimate companion for travel, outdoor adventures, and poolside relaxation. Designed with a sleek black aesthetic, this portable speaker doesn't just look good; it brings audio performance to new heights.

**Key Features:**

- **Premium Audio Quality:** Dive into deep, clear, and immersive sound thanks to Bose's exclusive audio technologies, including a custom-engineered transducer and innovative PositionIQ technology, which ensures optimal audio output regardless of orientation.

- **Built to Brave the Elements:** Certified with an IP67 waterproof rating, this robust speaker is not only waterproof but also floats on water, making it perfect for worry-free listening by the pool or at the beach. Dust, shock, corrosion, and UV light resistance mean the SoundLink Flex is ready to endure all your adventures.

- **True Portability:** Compact and thoughtfully designed with a handy utility loop, the SoundLink Flex is easy to hold, store, and secure. Whether you‚Äôre climbing a mountain or lounging by the sea, this speaker is engineered to tag along effortlessly.

- **Long-Lasting Battery Life:** Enjoy up to 12 hours of non-stop music from a single charge. When it's time to recharge, the included USB-C cable will have your speaker ready to go in approximately 4 hours.

- **Smart Connectivity:** Stay connected with a wireless range of up to 30 feet. With a built-in microphone, you can access virtual assistants like Siri and Google Assistant or take calls without missing a beat. The Bose Connect App further enhances your experience with software updates and customizable settings.

- **Durability Meets Design:** Drop tested and ready for action, the SoundLink Flex combines resilience with style, ensuring your music doesn't just sound great but also withstands the rigors of your active lifestyle.

Whether you're setting off on a journey or creating memories with friends, the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is your go-to audio powerhouse. Black, bold, and built for the real world ‚Äì your soundtrack deserves nothing less.

**Get ready to transform the way you listen to music ‚Äì anywhere, anytime.**

Immerse yourself in deep, clear, and captivating audio that resonates with every beat. Fear no splash, dust, or drop! The Bose SoundLink Flex boasts an impressive IP67 waterproof rating, floats on water, and is engineered to withstand dust, shock, and corrosion. Whether you're caught in the rain or lounging by the pool, your speaker remains safe, sound, and ready to rock.

The SoundLink Flex is more than just a pretty face. It's drop-tested, rust-resistant, and UV light resistant, guaranteeing that it can keep up with your active lifestyle. The compact design and practical utility loop make it incredibly easy to hold, store, or secure to your gear while on the go.

üì≤ Smart Tech at Your Fingertips:
Customize your listening experience with the Bose Connect App, offering software updates and customizable settings to make your speaker truly yours. The app also simplifies connecting and switching between devices, making it a breeze to manage your audio.

Whether you're embarking on a cross-country road trip, exploring the great outdoors, or simply kicking back by the pool, the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is your ticket to a premium listening experience that moves with you. Don't let the opportunity to elevate your audio adventures slip away ‚Äì grab your SoundLink Flex today and set the soundtrack to your life's most memorable moments! üé∂

Elevate your sound experience wherever you go with the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker ‚Äì the ultimate portable speaker tailored for any adventure. This sleek, all-black audio powerhouse brings your music to life with deep, crystal-clear sound that's immersive and full-bodied. Whether you're traveling, enjoying the great outdoors, or lounging by the pool, the SoundLink Flex is designed to be by your side.

Crafted with exclusive technologies, including a custom-engineered transducer and the innovative PositionIQ technology, the Bose SoundLink Flex ensures your music always sounds its best, no matter where you place it. The IP67 waterproof rating means it's not just splash-proof, it's fully submersible. Plus, it floats! So go ahead, take it to the beach, the pool, or even in the shower without a second thought.

Durability is at the core of the SoundLink Flex design. It's dust, drop, corrosion, and UV light resistant, making it a tough companion that withstands all the elements. Its compact design, coupled with a utility loop, provides easy portability and security, ensuring your speaker is always within reach.

Stay powered up for up to 12 hours with its long-lasting lithium-ion battery, and when it's time to recharge, the fast USB-C charging gets you back to full power in just about 4 hours. With Bluetooth connectivity, you can stream music from up to 30 feet away, and the built-in microphone allows for crystal-clear calls and access to voice assistants like Siri and Google Assistant.

Personalize your listening experience with the Bose Connect App, which provides software updates and customizable settings. Whether you're setting the mood for a dinner party or keeping the energy high during a workout, the Bose SoundLink Flex is your go-to wireless waterproof speaker.

Don't settle for less when it comes to your music. Choose the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker and transform your auditory landscape no matter where life takes you.
